page.title: 15HORSES:MRS BUCKNALL
page.content: At the {BUCKNALL'S}they have a horse called {NAUGHTY NIECE. {MR BUCKNALL}keeps partridges and pheasants. He keeps the eggs warm in a thing that looks like a chest of drawers. They showed us round their house but just where most of the horsey things were kept. They have chickens and chicks. We were allowed to touch one chick but we were not allowed to pick it up in case we dropped it. They also keep ducks there. We saw some ducks in the cow shed the cows only go in the cow shed in winter. The {BUCKNALL'S}have two dogs called WHISPER AND WINNIE and a little puppy dog called {PEBBLE}who was everybody's favourite.
